item.description:
Hi Everyone,
Some of you went on Saturday, I went with ConnYak for a Paddling Event on the Metabassett River...

I know most of you already posted you would be going sunday.. I did nt know how to transfer that infor to sunday..so i just made it a new event..

This event is Collinsville Canoe and Kayak event..

I will be biking in from a location just south of the Collinsville Event, it lessons traffic and i need the excersize..
But you can of course just go to the Kayak place and not bike.. so its an option...

If Biking: I will get to the new parking area for the rails to trails located on Rte 4 just north of where Frendlies amd Mack Donalds is ( intersections 177 and 4) and just over the river on the east side of rte 4..
Ok from Hartford: 84 west take exit 39 for route 4 east..
Stay on route 4 past all the s intersection, rte 10 all the way till you get to Unionville at rte 177 and 4.
Stay on 4 about 3/4 mile, River road is on left , look right and you will see a new parking area for the Bike Path..
I will be there at 10:00 am..
and ride to collinsville canoe and kayak..

please check your maps...you can typ in 285 collinsville road, Unionville, ct to get you real close...

2007 SPRING DEMO WEEKEND & SALE
"Try Before You Buy"
Informative & Fun Talks and Demonstrations
APRIL 29
Sunday 10am - 5pm
Rain or Shine
Admission is FREE!

Everything's On Sale!

Download the sale flyer! Coming soon!


SELL YOUR USED BOAT ON CONSIGNMENT

Representatives and information from the following companies and organizations will be on hand:
SWIFT CANOE & KAYAK
BELL· DAGGER· HOBIE· GRUMMAN· LIQUID LOGIC
MAD RIVER· NATIVE· NECKY· P & H SEA KAYAKS
PERCEPTION· PRIJON· PYRANHA
WAVE SPORT
WILDERNESS SYSTEMS

Aquabound Paddles· Kokatat
Lendal Paddles· North Water· NRS
Paddle Boy Designs
Paddler's Supply· Pro Tec Helmets
Seals Sprayskirts· Seattle Sports
Stohlquist· Thule· Travel Chair
Werner Paddles· Wildwasser
Yakima· YakPads

Appalachian Mountain Club
Battenkill Valley Outdoors
Connecticut Coast Guard Auxillary
Connecticut River Watershed
ConnYak
Farmington River Club
Farmington River Watershed Association
Housatonic Valley Paddler Club
Northern Forest Canoe Trail

WEEKEND PRESENTATIONS
All talks and demonstrations are free of charge!
Most are held along the river bank, look for the
Clinic Area Sign!


SUNDAY

BBQ
Hamburgers
Veggie Burgers, Hot Dogs, too!
11am - 3pm
Both Days!

Location:41 Bridge St (Route 179)
PO Box 336
Collinsville, CT
06022

I will guess this place is crowded on these days...it will be hard to miss the place..
Check you maps for its location and directions.

Website:http://www.cckstore.c....
